content:
Yes, there are many Italian restaurants in New Haven, Connecticut, but some of the top-rated ones by customers are:

1. L'Orcio - offers contemporary Italian cuisine and an extensive wine list. Their menu features a variety of pasta dishes, seafood, and meat entrees. 2. Consiglio's Restaurant - offers classic Italian dishes such as pasta, seafood, and veal. They also have pizza and vegetarian options. 3. Tre Scalini - offers traditional Italian dishes made with locally-sourced ingredients. Their menu includes pasta, meat, and seafood dishes, as well as vegetarian options. 4. Goodfellas - offers a unique Italian dining experience and a variety of authentic Neapolitan pizzas made in a wood-fired oven. 5. Basta Trattoria - offers modern Italian cuisine made with fresh, seasonal ingredients. Their menu includes pasta dishes, seafood, and meat entrees, as well as vegetarian and gluten-free options. It's always a good idea to check the reviews and menus before deciding on a restaurant, but these are some great options to start with!
